field.name: Enable
field.description: Master enable for the device interrupt output to the system interrupt controller: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled

field.name: CHAN0_INT_ST
field.description: Channel 0 (ap_done) Interrupt Status. 0 = No Channel 0 interrupt, 1 = Channel 0 interrupt.

field.name: CHAN1_INT_ST
field.description: Channel 1 (ap_ready) Interrupt Status. 0 = No Channel 1 interrupt, 1 = Channel 1 interrupt.
